description: The script is a batch job submission script for various batch queuing systems. It supports a wide range of systems, including IBM LoadLeveler, SLURM, PBS, MOAB, Torque, NQS, and PJM. The script allows users to specify various resource requirements, such as CPU time, memory, nodes, tasks per node, threads per task, queue, project account, feature, disc space, qsubmem, qsubtime, group number, and email notification.
